name: Techini
description: Techini is a full-service web design agency based in Barcelona, Spain. Techini has over 10 years of experience in building and maintaining websites. They passionate about translating your message and ideas to digital. The firm specializes in building websites with advanced online functionalities, web shops, web 2.0, online marketing, SEO (Search Engine Optimization). Clients include small and medium-sized businesses, hospitals, web shops.
